title: 2014-15 patch (v1.0) for FIFA 11
description:
2014-15 patch (v1.0) for FIFA 11


included:

- Selector
* Arena stadiums added: BayArena, FIWC stadium, Stade de Suisse
* Players list: updated (corrected names + new players added)
* Added Tournaments: Spa. Copa del Rey, FIFA World Cup 2018, CONCACAF Gold Cup, AFC Asian Cup, Africa Cup of Nations
* Fix: no option selected when turned off (Support > FRPO ,Support > PI (lua) )

- Squads
* date: 27.02.2015 (official fifa 15 squad update)
+ update accessories players (socks, tight kits, ...)
* career: update settings polish league/cup
* Added Stadium names for all teams (offline version only)
* 13 New legend players added to classic XI:

- Game performance/improvements
* improved performance when Gameplay is "No New Gameplay (original FIFA 11)"
* Fix: Atletico madrid - error statements causing adboard, ... not to load
* compressed kits (after install): 12 times smaller (1000 MB --> 82,5 MB )



+ 2014-15 patch (v0.6) INCLUDED
+ 2014-15 patch (v0.7) INCLUDED



Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, Russian


Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)

3. install 2014-15 patch (v0.5)
4. install 2014-15 patch (v1.0)

5. apply new Squads
* Open Selector > Select database > "1.  Default squads (Updated)" > ONLINE version / OFFLINE version > Apply Database
* "Done"


Notes:
* 2014-15 patch (v0.6) & 2014-15 patch (v0.7) included in this release


Problems:
- crashes, ...: use the "i68 regenerator" (select "take care of edited files..." > go , can take some time) 



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
